entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
